
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53165360">
把A-B转换B-A，后缀名不变，把这个BAT放到文件同目录下运行，效果是批量把&nbsp; &nbsp;张三-风雨无阻.doc&nbsp; &nbsp; 转换成&nbsp; &nbsp;风雨无阻-张三.doc<br>
<br>
@echo off<br>
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion<br>
<br>
for %%f in (*-*.*) do (<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; set "original=%%~nf"<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; set "ext=%%~xf"<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; set "part1=!original:-= !"<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; for /f "tokens=1,2" %%a in ("!part1!") do (<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ren "%%f" "%%b-%%a!ext!"<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; )<br>
)<br>
<br>
echo 重命名完成！<br>
puase&gt;nul</td></tr></tbody></table>
